channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: The doctors reveal how much power there is in your farts. Also, Dr Chris trains as a nurse on a ward full of robotic patients, and in Ouch & About Dr Xand opens up the ouch-mobile - a drop-in clinic for all your medical mysteries. Meanwhile, over in accident and emergency, one patient has cut her nose and another has burnt his hand.
